messages.content: Yeah. Odds are, the 1400 number specifically excludes the intended number of content creators

To be clearer, the 1400 are all people who are getting in by the exact same method you are getting in. There will be a very very small number of other special invites split among content creators, investors, partners, etc, but this is from a separate budget and they may not even have as complete access to the pre-alpha compared to the 1400 (still figuring this out). Remember the main goal here is to test the game and get feedback, so we need as many players like yourselves as possible. BUT we are also talking to content creators because they have a completely separate set of needs for the game that we need *their* feedback on. So we have to make sure we get a diverse set of opinions from that group as well. Hopefully that helps clarify.
